question: The Sayyid dynasty of the Delhi Sultanate is called so because__?
option1: Its founder and his successors adopted the title Sayyid
option2: Its founder and his successors belonged to the Sayyid tribe of eastern Turkistan
option3: Its founder and his successors were descendant of the prophet Muhammad
option4: Its founder was a scholar of Islamic theology
answer: Its founder and his successors were descendant of the prophet Muhammad
explanation: Khizr Khan was the descendant of the prophet Muhammad .The Sayyid dynasty was the fourth dynasty of the Delhi Sultanate from 1414 to 1451 A.D. Khizr Khan was the founder ruler of Sayyid dynasty and he is said to be a descendant of Prophet Muhammad.
